content.raw: this test is a little different than the osrf/gazebo test, which is ok (actually better since the velocity controller here should converge to steady-state faster than the open-loop controller in osrf/gazebo), but one difference is that this only has expectations for 1 timestep, but the osrf/gazebo test uses the last 15 or so timesteps. it shouldn't be too hard to put this expectation in a for loop and iterate over the last few time steps.
content.html: this test is a little different than the osrf/gazebo test, which is ok (actually better since the velocity controller here should converge to steady-state faster than the open-loop controller in osrf/gazebo), but one difference is that this only has expectations for 1 timestep, but the osrf/gazebo test uses the last 15 or so timesteps. it shouldn't be too hard to put this expectation in a for loop and iterate over the last few time steps.
